```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library("tidyverse")
library("janitor")
```


```{r}
bison <- read_csv("data/bison.csv")
```

```{r}
dim(bison)
```

```{r}
str(bison)
```

```{r}
names(bison)
```

```{r}
bison_round_two <- bison %>% 
  select("data_code", "animal_sex","animal_weight","animal_yob")
bison_round_two
```

```{r}
age <- bison_round_two %>% 
  filter(between(animal_yob, 1980, 1990))
age
```

```{r}
table(age$animal_sex)
```

```{r}
select(age, "animal_sex", "animal_weight")
```

```{r}
female <- age %>% 
  select("animal_sex", "animal_weight") %>% 
  filter(animal_sex=="F")
```

```{r}
female_weight <- (female$animal_weight)
mean(female_weight)
```

```{r}
male <- age %>% 
  select("animal_sex", "animal_weight") %>% 
  filter(animal_sex=="M")
```

```{r}
male_weight <- (male$animal_weight)
mean(male_weight)
```
